sentences: In its conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2013/L.17), the SBSTA, inter alia : - notes that considerable progress will need to be made in 2013 on: references to the calculation of assigned amounts and the first commitment period; implementation modalities in relation to the standard electronic format tables related to carry-over, previous period surplus reserve accounts, Article 3.7 ter of the Protocol, reporting on the share of proceeds and any increases of ambition; and clarification of reporting requirements for Annex I parties without a commitment during the second commitment period; - invites party submissions, in particular, on the draft changes to the CRF tables for reporting LULUCF activities during the second commitment period; - requests the Secretariat to prepare draft CRF tables and update the technical paper contained in FCCC/TP/2012/6; and - agrees to continue discussions at SBSTA 39 with a view to preparing draft CMP 9 decisions, taking into account the draft text contained in the annex to the SBSTA conclusions.
